name: part_008
file: tmp_【#天音かなた2周年LIVE】無料 3DLIVE 「リベンジ」⧸ Amane Kanata 3DLIVE ＂Revenge＂【天音かなた⧸ホロライブ】 [Dji-ehIz5_k]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Amane Kanata performs a medley of songs, ending with a high-intensity segment featuring 'Aishite Aishite Aishite' and other emotional tracks.
A transition interlude with atmospheric visual effects and instrumental music leading into the next song.
Amane Kanata performs 'Unknown Mother Goose' by wowaka, with dynamic typography on the background screens.

subtitles.original: 離さないよ 嗚呼
subtitles.english: I won't let go, ah

subtitles.original: ごめんなさい
subtitles.english: I'm sorry

subtitles.original: 愛して 愛して 愛して もっともっと
subtitles.english: Love me, love me, love me, more and more

subtitles.original: 愛して 愛して 狂おしいほどに
subtitles.english: Love me, love me, until it's maddening

subtitles.original: 苦しい 離さない
subtitles.english: It hurts, I won't let go

subtitles.original: 苦しい もっともっと
subtitles.english: It hurts, more and more

subtitles.original: ねえ
subtitles.english: Hey

subtitles.original: 幸せの
subtitles.english: Of happiness

subtitles.original: 幸せの 嗚呼
subtitles.english: Of happiness, ah

subtitles.original: あたしが愛を語るのなら
subtitles.english: If I were to speak of love,

subtitles.original: その眼には如何、映る？
subtitles.english: how would it look in your eyes?

subtitles.original: 詞は有り余るばかり
subtitles.english: Words are more than enough,

subtitles.original: 無垢の音が流れてく
subtitles.english: the sound of innocence flows on.

subtitles.original: あなたが愛にまみれるまで
subtitles.english: Until you are covered in love,

subtitles.original: その色は幻だ
subtitles.english: that color is an illusion.

subtitles.original: ひとりぼっち 音に呑まれれば
subtitles.english: If you're all alone and swallowed by sound,

subtitles.original: 全世界共通の快楽さ
subtitles.english: it's a pleasure common to the whole world.

subtitles.original: アンノウン・マザーグース 作詞：wowaka 作曲：wowaka
subtitles.english: Unknown Mother Goose | Lyrics: wowaka | Composition: wowaka

subtitles.original: つまらない 呆然に溺れる 暮らしたれもが彼をなぞる
subtitles.english: Drowning in a dull daze, everyone living traces after him.

subtitles.original: 繰り返す使い回しの歌に また耳を塞いだ
subtitles.english: I covered my ears again to the repetitive, reused songs.

subtitles.original: あなたが愛を語るのなら それを答えとするの？
subtitles.english: If you were to speak of love, would you make that the answer?

subtitles.original: 目をつぶったふりをしてるなら
subtitles.english: If you're pretending to have your eyes closed,

subtitles.original: この曲で醒ましてくれ
subtitles.english: then wake me up with this song.

subtitles.original: 誰も知らぬ物語 思うばかり
subtitles.english: Thinking only of a story no one knows.

subtitles.original: 壊れそうなくらいに 抱き締めて泣き踊った
subtitles.english: I held on so tight it felt like I'd break, and danced while crying.

subtitles.original: 見境無い感情論 許されるのならば
subtitles.english: If such indiscriminate emotionalism could be forgiven...

subtitles.original: 泣き出すことすらできないまま 飲み込んでった
subtitles.english: Unable to even burst into tears, I just swallowed it down.

subtitles.original: 張り裂けてしまいそうな心があるってこと、叫ばせて！
subtitles.english: Let me scream that I have a heart that feels like it's about to burst!

subtitles.original: 世界があたしを拒んでも 今、
subtitles.english: Even if the world rejects me, now,

subtitles.original: 愛の唄 歌わせてくれないか
subtitles.english: won't you let me sing a song of love?

subtitles.original: もう一回 誰も知らないその想い
subtitles.english: One more time, those feelings that no one knows...

subtitles.original: この声に預けてみてもいいか
subtitles.english: ...can I entrust them to this voice?

subtitles.original: あなたには僕が見えるか？
subtitles.english: Can you see me?

subtitles.original: あなたには僕が見えるか？
subtitles.english: Can you see me?

subtitles.original: ガラクタばかり 投げつけられてきたその背中
subtitles.english: That back that's had nothing but junk thrown at it.

subtitles.original: それでも好きと言えたら
subtitles.english: If I could still say I love it,

subtitles.original: それでも好きを願えたら
subtitles.english: if I could still wish for love,

subtitles.original: ああ、あたしの全部に その意味はあると
subtitles.english: ah, that there's meaning in all of me.

subtitles.original: ねえ、愛を語るのなら 今その胸には誰がいる
subtitles.english: Hey, if you're speaking of love, who's in your heart right now?

subtitles.original: こころの箱を抉じ開けて さあ、生き写しのあなた見せて？
subtitles.english: Pry open the box of your heart and show me the spitting image of yourself.

subtitles.original: あたしが愛にまみれるのなら 今その色は何色だ
subtitles.english: If I'm to be covered in love, what color is it now?

subtitles.original: 孤独なんて記号では収まらない 心臓を抱えて生きてきたんだ！
subtitles.english: I've lived my life clutching a heart that can't be contained by a label like 'lonely'!

subtitles.original: ドッペルもどきが 其処いらに溢れた
subtitles.english: Doppelganger-wannabes were overflowing all over the place.

subtitles.original: 挙句の果ての今日 ライラライライ
subtitles.english: At the end of it all, today, lai-la-lai-lai.

subtitles.original: 心失きそれを 生み出した奴等は
subtitles.english: The ones who gave birth to that heartless thing...

subtitles.original: 見切りをつけてもう バイバイバイバイ
subtitles.english: I've given up on them already, bye-bye-bye-bye.

subtitles.original: 残されたあたしが この場所で今でも
subtitles.english: The me that was left behind, even now in this place...

subtitles.original: 涙を堪えてるの 如何して 如何して
subtitles.english: Why am I holding back tears? Why? Why?

subtitles.original: あたしは知ってるわ この場所はいつでも
subtitles.english: I know that this place is always...

subtitles.original: あなたに守られてきたってこと！
subtitles.english: ...the fact that I've been protected by you!

subtitles.original: 痛みなどあまりにも慣れてしまった
subtitles.english: I've grown far too used to things like pain.

subtitles.original: 何千回と巡らせ続けた 喜怒哀楽
subtitles.english: The emotions I've let circulate thousands of times.

subtitles.original: 失えない喜びがこの世界にあるならば
subtitles.english: If there's a joy in this world that can't be lost,

subtitles.original: 手放すことすら出来ない 哀しみさえあたしは
subtitles.english: then even the sadness that I can't even let go of, I...

subtitles.original: この心の 中つまはじきに してしまうのか？ それは、いやだ！
subtitles.english: ...will I end up ostracizing it within this heart? I don't want that!

subtitles.original: どうやって この世界を愛せるかな
subtitles.english: How can I love this world?

subtitles.original: いつだって 転がり続けるんだろう
subtitles.english: I'll always just keep on rolling, won't I?

subtitles.original: ねえ、いっそ 誰も気づかないその想い
subtitles.english: Hey, rather, those feelings that no one notices...

subtitles.original: この唄で 明かしてみようと思うんだよ
subtitles.english: ...I think I'll try to reveal them with this song.

subtitles.original: あなたなら何を願うか
subtitles.english: What would you wish for?

subtitles.original: あなたなら何を望むか
subtitles.english: What would you desire?

subtitles.original: 軋んだ心が 誰より今を生きてるの
subtitles.english: My creaking heart is living for the now more than anyone.

subtitles.original: あなたには僕が見えるか？
subtitles.english: Can you see me?

subtitles.original: あなたには僕が見えるか？
subtitles.english: Can you see me?

subtitles.original: それ、あたしの行く末を照らす 灯なんだろう？
subtitles.english: That's the light that illuminates my future, isn't it?
